'''"Baobab's Golden Cradle"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Baobab's Golden Cradle" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Cuihua Wood = 6
|Fabric = 2
|Yellow Dye = 2
|sort = Cuihua Wood;Fabric;Yellow Dye
}}
